contentrichtext.text: {{multiple issues| {{no footnotes|date=June 2013}} {{primary sources|date=June 2013}} {{ref improve|date=June 2013}} }} The '''[[Henry Laurence Gantt]] Medal''' was established in 1929 by the [[American Society of Mechanical Engineers]] for "distinguished achievement in management and service to the community." == Winners == * 1944 - [[Lillian Moller Gilbreth]] * 2000 - [[Paul Soros]] * 2001 - [[Roy Huffington]] * 2002 - [[Alexander Dreyfoos]] * 2003 - [[William Timken]] * 2004 - [[Julie England]] * 2005 - [[Kathleen M. Bader]] * 2006 - [[Charla K. Wise]] * 2007 - [[Kevin M. Gottschall]] * 2008 - [[Ellen Doherty]] * 2009 - [[Claudio Valdetara]] == See also == * [[ASME#Society Awards|List of prizes, medals, and awards awarded by ASME]] * [[List of prizes, medals, and awards]] * [[Project management]] == External links == *[http://www.asme.org/Governance/Honors/SocietyAwards/Henry_Laurence_Gantt_Medal.cfm Official Web Page of Gantt Medal] [[Category:Mechanical engineering awards]] [[Category:American awards]] [[Category:Awards established in 1929]] {{award-stub}}
